GP10bhp_01u:1634: BhP_01.18.045/3 tato 'rthakāmābhiniveśitātmanāṃ śunāṃ kapīnām iva varṇasaṅkaraḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1635: BhP_01.18.046/1 dharmapālo narapatiḥ sa tu samrāḍbṛhacchravāḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1637: BhP_01.18.046/5 kṣuttṛṭśramayuto dīno naivāsmac chāpam arhati
GP10bhp_01u:1639: BhP_01.18.047/3 pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ tadbhagavān sarvātmā kṣantum arhati
GP10bhp_01u:1640: BhP_01.18.048/1 tiraskṛtā vipralabdhāḥ śaptāḥ kṣiptā hatā api
GP10bhp_01u:1641: BhP_01.18.048/3 nāsya tat pratikurvanti tadbhaktāḥ prabhavo 'pi hi
GP10bhp_01u:1643: BhP_01.18.049/3 svayaṃ viprakṛto rājñā naivāghaṃ tadacintayat
GP10bhp_01u:1644: BhP_01.18.050/1 prāyaśaḥ sādhavo loke parairdvandveṣu yojitāḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1645: BhP_01.18.050/3 na vyathanti na hṛṣyanti yata ātmāguṇāśrayaḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1647: BhP_01.19.001/1 mahīpatistvatha tatkarma garhyaṃ vicintayann ātmakṛtaṃ sudurmanāḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1648: BhP_01.19.001/3 aho mayā nīcam anāryavat kṛtaṃ nirāgasi brahmaṇi gūḍhatejasi
GP10bhp_01u:1649: BhP_01.19.002/1 dhruvaṃ tato me kṛtadevahelanād duratyayaṃ vyasanaṃ nātidīrghāt
GP10bhp_01u:1650: BhP_01.19.002/3 tadastu kāmaṃ hyaghaniṣkṛtāya me yathā na kuryāṃ punarevam addhā
GP10bhp_01u:1651: BhP_01.19.003/1 adyaiva rājyaṃ balam ṛddhakośaṃ prakopitabrahmakulānalo me
GP10bhp_01u:1652: BhP_01.19.003/3 dahatvabhadrasya punarna me 'bhūt pāpīyasī dhīrdvijadevagobhyaḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1653: BhP_01.19.004/1 sa cintayann ittham athāśṛṇodyathā muneḥ sutokto nirṛtistakṣakākhyaḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1654: BhP_01.19.004/3 sa sādhu mene na cireṇa takṣakā nalaṃ prasaktasya viraktikāraṇam
GP10bhp_01u:1655: BhP_01.19.005/1 atho vihāyemam amuṃ ca lokaṃ vimarśitau heyatayā purastāt
GP10bhp_01u:1656: BhP_01.19.005/3 kṛṣṇāṅghrisevām adhimanyamāna upāviśat prāyam amartyanadyām
GP10bhp_01u:1658: BhP_01.19.006/3 punāti lokān ubhayatra seśān kastāṃ na seveta mariṣyamāṇaḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1659: BhP_01.19.007/1 iti vyavacchidya sa pāṇḍaveyaḥ prāyopaveśaṃ prati viṣṇupadyām
GP10bhp_01u:1660: BhP_01.19.007/3 dadhau mukundāṅghrim ananyabhāvo munivrato muktasamastasaṅgaḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1661: BhP_01.19.008/1 tatropajagmurbhuvanaṃ punānā mahānubhāvā munayaḥ saśiṣyāḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1662: BhP_01.19.008/3 prāyeṇa tīrthābhigamāpadeśaiḥ svayaṃ hi tīrthāni punanti santaḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1664: BhP_01.19.009/3 parāśaro gādhisuto 'tha rāma utathya indrapramadedhmavāhau
GP10bhp_01u:1665: BhP_01.19.010/1 medhātithirdevala ārṣṭiṣeṇo bhāradvājo gautamaḥ pippalādaḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1666: BhP_01.19.010/3 maitreya aurvaḥ kavaṣaḥ kumbhayonir dvaipāyano bhagavān nāradaśca
GP10bhp_01u:1667: BhP_01.19.011/1 anye ca devarṣibrahmarṣivaryā rājarṣivaryā aruṇādayaśca
GP10bhp_01u:1668: BhP_01.19.011/3 nānārṣeyapravarān sametān abhyarcya rājā śirasā vavande
GP10bhp_01u:1669: BhP_01.19.012/1 sukhopaviṣṭeṣvatha teṣu bhūyaḥ kṛtapraṇāmaḥ svacikīrṣitaṃ yat
GP10bhp_01u:1672: BhP_01.19.013/1 aho vayaṃ dhanyatamā nṛpāṇāṃ mahattamānugrahaṇīyaśīlāḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1673: BhP_01.19.013/3 rājñāṃ kulaṃ brāhmaṇapādaśaucād dūrādvisṛṣṭaṃ bata garhyakarma
GP10bhp_01u:1674: BhP_01.19.014/1 tasyaiva me 'ghasya parāvareśo vyāsaktacittasya gṛheṣvabhīkṣṇam
GP10bhp_01u:1675: BhP_01.19.014/3 nirvedamūlo dvijaśāparūpo yatra prasakto bhayam āśu dhatte
GP10bhp_01u:1676: BhP_01.19.015/1 taṃ mopayātaṃ pratiyantu viprā gaṅgā ca devī dhṛtacittam īśe
GP10bhp_01u:1677: BhP_01.19.015/3 dvijopasṛṣṭaḥ kuhakastakṣako vā daśatvalaṃ gāyata viṣṇugāthāḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1678: BhP_01.19.016/1 punaśca bhūyādbhagavatyanante ratiḥ prasaṅgaśca tadāśrayeṣu
GP10bhp_01u:1679: BhP_01.19.016/3 mahatsu yāṃ yām upayāmi sṛṣṭiṃ maitryastu sarvatra namo dvijebhyaḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1680: BhP_01.19.017/1 iti sma rājādhyavasāyayuktaḥ prācīnamūleṣu kuśeṣu dhīraḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1681: BhP_01.19.017/3 udaṅmukho dakṣiṇakūla āste samudrapatnyāḥ svasutanyastabhāraḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1682: BhP_01.19.018/1 evaṃ ca tasmin naradevadeve prāyopaviṣṭe divi devasaṅghāḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1683: BhP_01.19.018/3 praśasya bhūmau vyakiran prasūnair mudā muhurdundubhayaśca neduḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1684: BhP_01.19.019/1 maharṣayo vai samupāgatā ye praśasya sādhvityanumodamānāḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1686: BhP_01.19.020/1 na vā idaṃ rājarṣivarya citraṃ bhavatsu kṛṣṇaṃ samanuvrateṣu
GP10bhp_01u:1688: BhP_01.19.021/1 sarve vayaṃ tāvadihāsmahe 'tha kalevaraṃ yāvadasau vihāya
GP10bhp_01u:1689: BhP_01.19.021/3 lokaṃ paraṃ virajaskaṃ viśokaṃ yāsyatyayaṃ bhāgavatapradhānaḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1690: BhP_01.19.022/1 āśrutya tadṛṣigaṇavacaḥ parīkṣit samaṃ madhucyudguru cāvyalīkam
GP10bhp_01u:1691: BhP_01.19.022/3 ābhāṣatainān abhinandya yuktān śuśrūṣamāṇaścaritāni viṣṇoḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1692: BhP_01.19.023/1 samāgatāḥ sarvata eva sarve vedā yathā mūrtidharāstripṛṣṭhe
GP10bhp_01u:1693: BhP_01.19.023/3 nehātha nāmutra ca kaścanārtha ṛte parānugraham ātmaśīlam
GP10bhp_01u:1694: BhP_01.19.024/1 tataśca vaḥ pṛcchyam imaṃ vipṛcche viśrabhya viprā iti kṛtyatāyām
GP10bhp_01u:1695: BhP_01.19.024/3 sarvātmanā mriyamāṇaiśca kṛtyaṃ śuddhaṃ ca tatrāmṛśatābhiyuktāḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1696: BhP_01.19.025/1 tatrābhavadbhagavān vyāsaputro yadṛcchayā gām aṭamāno 'napekṣaḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1700: BhP_01.19.027/1 nigūḍhajatruṃ pṛthutuṅgavakṣasam āvartanābhiṃ valivalgūdaraṃ ca
GP10bhp_01u:1702: BhP_01.19.028/1 śyāmaṃ sadāpīvyavayo'ṅgalakṣmyā strīṇāṃ manojñaṃ rucirasmitena
GP10bhp_01u:1703: BhP_01.19.028/3 pratyutthitāste munayaḥ svāsanebhyas tallakṣaṇajñā api gūḍhavarcasam
GP10bhp_01u:1704: BhP_01.19.029/1 sa viṣṇurāto 'tithaya āgatāya tasmai saparyāṃ śirasājahāra
GP10bhp_01u:1705: BhP_01.19.029/3 tato nivṛttā hyabudhāḥ striyo 'rbhakā mahāsane sopaviveśa pūjitaḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1706: BhP_01.19.030/1 sa saṃvṛtastatra mahān mahīyasāṃ brahmarṣirājarṣidevarṣisaṅghaiḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1707: BhP_01.19.030/3 vyarocatālaṃ bhagavān yathendur graharkṣatārānikaraiḥ parītaḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1708: BhP_01.19.031/1 praśāntam āsīnam akuṇṭhamedhasaṃ muniṃ nṛpo bhāgavato 'bhyupetya
GP10bhp_01u:1709: BhP_01.19.031/3 praṇamya mūrdhnāvahitaḥ kṛtāñjalir natvā girā sūnṛtayānvapṛcchat
GP10bhp_01u:1711: BhP_01.19.032/1 aho adya vayaṃ brahman satsevyāḥ kṣatrabandhavaḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1713: BhP_01.19.033/1 yeṣāṃ saṃsmaraṇāt puṃsāṃ sadyaḥ śuddhyanti vai gṛhāḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1715: BhP_01.19.034/1 sānnidhyāt te mahāyogin pātakāni mahāntyapi
GP10bhp_01u:1716: BhP_01.19.034/3 sadyo naśyanti vai puṃsāṃ viṣṇoriva suretarāḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1717: BhP_01.19.035/1 api me bhagavān prītaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pāṇḍusutapriyaḥ
GP10bhp_01u:1719: BhP_01.19.036/1 anyathā te 'vyaktagaterdarśanaṃ naḥ kathaṃ nṛṇām
GP10bhp_01u:1721: BhP_01.19.037/1 ataḥ pṛcchāmi saṃsiddhiṃ yogināṃ paramaṃ gurum
GP10bhp_01u:1722: BhP_01.19.037/3 puruṣasyeha yat kāryaṃ mriyamāṇasya sarvathā
GP10bhp_01u:1723: BhP_01.19.038/1 yac chrotavyam atho japyaṃ yat kartavyaṃ nṛbhiḥ prabho
GP10bhp_01u:1724: BhP_01.19.038/3 smartavyaṃ bhajanīyaṃ vā brūhi yadvā viparyayam
GP10bhp_01u:1725: BhP_01.19.039/1 nūnaṃ bhagavato brahman gṛheṣu gṛhamedhinām
GP10bhp_01u:1726: BhP_01.19.039/3 na lakṣyate hyavasthānam api godohanaṃ kvacit
GP10bhp_01u:1728: BhP_01.19.040/1 evam ābhāṣitaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sa rājñā ślakṣṇayā girā
